articles.description: The Amazon sale began on Friday, January 7 and will go on till January 12.
articles.content: E-commerce giant Amazon has announced a Mobile and TV Saving Days sale in India. The new sale will bring a host of deals and offers on smart TVs, smartphones, and other accessories. The sale started … [+2361 chars]
